description_html:
Meet Anita, an effortless hospitality cabinet with a nod to mid-century design.
Anita features custom designed and printed artwork on scratch proof aluminum panels framed in walnut veneer.
The interior cabinets have been equipped for the needs of the guest, with a vented back for mini-fridge on one side; sliding shelf and drawer for amenities on the other.
The Anita is wholly customizable from the exterior artwork, material, finish and interior specifications, to additions such as convenience outlets and lighting.
